titleStmt.title: Second Division, Military District of Kentucky

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Second Division, Military District of Kentucky

body.p: One of two divisions in the Military District of Kentucky from August 1864 to January 17, 1865. Comprised of a brigade and unbrigaded regiments. Commander(s): General Hugh Ewing.

ab.bibl:
The War of the Rebellion: A Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies Ser. 1, vol. 39, pt. 2 (Washington, DC: Government Printing Office, 1890), p. 561, 564.
The War of the Rebellion: A Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies Ser. 1, vol. 31, pt. 3 (Washington, DC: Government Printing Office, 1890), p. 572.
Ezra J. Warner, Generals in Blue: Lives of the Union Commanders (Baton Rouge: Louisiana State University Press, 1964), 146.
